akn:section.akn:heading: Senate resolutions for investigations; limit of cost

akn:content.akn:p: § 196. Senate resolutions for investigations; limit of cost Senate resolutions providing for inquiries and investigations shall contain a limit of cost of such investigation, which limit shall not be exceeded except by vote of the Senate authorizing additional amounts. (Mar. 3, 1926, ch. 44, § 1, 44 Stat. 162.)
